description: Emergency room triage and appointment scheduling system with comprehensive medical assessment capabilities

appointment_system.description: Patient appointment scheduling and availability checking

medical.description: Emergency medical assessment and triage protocols

assess_pain.description: Assess pain severity and location to determine urgency level
assess_pain.returns: urgency level (high/medium/low) and estimated wait time
assess_pain.notes: Uses numeric pain scale (1-10) or descriptive terms (severe/moderate/mild)

code_blue.description: Initiate cardiac emergency protocol and alert emergency team
code_blue.returns: emergency team ETA and response status
code_blue.notes: Triggers immediate life-saving response for suspected cardiac events

check_oxygen.returns: oxygen saturation percentage and respiratory status

trauma_assessment.description: Evaluate trauma severity based on injury mechanism and presentation
trauma_assessment.returns: trauma level (1-5) and recommended treatment plan
trauma_assessment.notes: Level 1 is highest priority requiring immediate intervention

fall_protocol.description: Geriatric fall assessment for fractures and head injury screening
fall_protocol.returns: fall assessment results and estimated wait time
fall_protocol.notes: Mandatory for patients over 65 or with anticoagulant use

fever_protocol.description: Fever assessment to determine infection severity and sepsis risk
fever_protocol.returns: fever severity classification and wait time
fever_protocol.notes: High priority for temp >= 103Â°F or immunocompromised patients
